/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's view of the surroundings. The road itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. In the distance, a large billboard stands tall, a common sight in bustling cityscapes. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is bathed in natural daylight, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
